Head.Name: Chainmail
Head.Description: A flexible armor made up of many rings rivited together into the shape of a long coat or tunic

Torso.Name: Chainmail
Torso.Description: A flexible armor made up of many rings rivited together into the shape of a long coat or tunic

RightHand.Name: Sling
RightHand.Description: An ancient projectile weapon which is swung around the head and released to launch rocks or lead balls at suprising speed

Backpack.Name: Grease
Backpack.Description: Thick grease used to lubicate machinery. How does something so thick lubricate? Ask an engineer

Backpack.Name: Repellent
Backpack.Description: I dunno, if you ask me you're already repellent enough! OOOOOOH, SICK BURN BRO

Backpack.Name: Nails
Backpack.Description: Wait... these were not provided with the hammer? And the hammer doesn't come with the nails?

Backpack.Name: Bottle
Backpack.Description: A bottle with cap or stopper. What are you going to fill it with?!?! I'm so excited!
